docs.snippet: Tons of material, including clay from California, have transformed the Sydney Cricket Ground into a baseball stadium for Saturday’s season opener, between the Diamondbacks and the Dodgers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tons of material, including clay from California, have transformed the Sydney Cricket Ground into a baseball stadium for Saturday’s season opener, between the Diamondbacks and the Dodgers.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column examines season-opening series between the Arizona Diamondbacks and Los Angeles Dodgers that will be held at a transformed Sydney Cricket Ground in Sydney, Australia; notes that decision to hold event in Australia for the first time reflects developing baseball market there.

headline.main: Taking More Than Mitts to Australia for Opener
headline.print_headline: Taking More Than Mitts to Australia for Opening Day

docs.snippet: Brendan Ryan, unable to play because of back spasms, expects to start the season on the disabled list....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brendan Ryan, unable to play because of back spasms, expects to start the season on the disabled list.
docs.abstract: Brendan Ryan, shortstop brought in by the New York Yankees as a backup to Derek Jeter, is expected to start the season on the disabled list due to back spasms; other baseball news noted.

headline.seo: Back Injury Sidelines Brendan Ryan of Yankees
headline.main: Yankees’ Insurance Policy at Shortstop Has a Physical Problem of His Own
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Insurance Policy at Shortstop Has a Physical Problem of His Own

docs.snippet: Prosecutors on Friday declined to file charges against a California man in the stabbing death of a Los Angeles Dodgers fan during a post-baseball-game fight, saying they could not disprove that he acted in self defense, a newspaper reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors on Friday declined to file charges against a California man in the stabbing death of a Los Angeles Dodgers fan during a post-baseball-game fight, saying they could not disprove that he acted in self defense, a newspaper reported.
